dai::ClusterGraph

dai::ClusterGraph Class Reference

#include <dai/clustergraph.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A ClusterGraph is a hypergraph with VarSets as nodes.

It is implemented as bipartite graph with variable (Var) nodes and cluster (VarSet) nodes.

Member Function Documentation

size_t dai::ClusterGraph::eliminationCost ( size_t  i  )  [inline]

Calculates cost of eliminating the variable with index i.

The cost is measured as "number of added edges in the adjacency graph", where the adjacency graph has the variables as its nodes and connects nodes i1 and i2 iff i1 and i2 occur in some common cluster.
